categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic awards

nodes.text: The Silver Scimitar was the third embellishment of the Kalidor Crescent, the highest honor awarded by the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The Kalidor Crescent was awarded for extreme acts of heroism and gallantry against an overwhelming force. The Silver Scimitar was given after a live individual performed a fourth instance of heroism and gallantry and had previously been awarded the Bronze Cluster and the Silver Talons. It was a small polished silver sword that was pinned to the ribbon above the kalidor.
